# deleteFolder

Mark a folder as `deleted`.

## Usage

```js
await dataverseConnector.runOS({
  method: SYSTEM_CALL.deleteFolder,
  params: { folderId },
});
```

## Parameters

```js
{
    folderId: string;
    syncImmediately?: boolean;
}
```

- `folderId` - The folder id.
- OPTIONAL - `syncImmediately` - Whether to sync the deletion to data network immediately or wait for os schedule. Default is `false`.

## Returns

```js
{
  currentFolder: StructuredFolder;
  allFolders: StructuredFolders;
}
```

Example:

```json
{
  "currentFolder": {
    "options": {
      "encryptedSymmetricKey": "",
      "decryptionConditions": "",
      "encrypted": "3FdrnDaJ7O-p9M4gvb-nqDX-Ir_gOcClKn1VMGGuaUyOp0r8qIy6EZWH910yVxjioOdIpz_5IYEtD54mJmS--mYs0plk8S7nF6RAGR2o7Jg",
      "folderName": "Private",
      "folderDescription": ""
    },
    "app": "fxy001",
    "model": [
      "kjzl6hvfrbw6c9k4u7fjs3guaasf2rt7s7hdo263xo84irab7pne5mfjwsxqc8z",
      "kjzl6hvfrbw6ca4r7cdi7adbmlu4dtuau3wqtndzx9owppolxik7hxk8fwcs4jx"
    ],
    "folderType": 1,
    "createdAt": "2023-06-09T10:54:28.435Z",
    "updatedAt": "2023-06-09T10:54:28.435Z",
    "folderId": "kjzl6kcym7w8y71x94bqoj8no0my3m8ks210lpz9fva2aobs7a5okmecd293fw0",
    "contentFolderIds": [
      "kjzl6kcym7w8y7cuix19jct0v9vk7b65l9eta6rcdv3g0zyhaerk5ct5ytuixdr"
    ],
    "mirrors": {},
    "mirrorsLocked": false,
    "deleted": true
  },
  "allFolders": {
    "kjzl6kcym7w8y6ywzcsmzjx6vxmw5f28l87v8w9bvgkf1k20nrnw57xfddqb52q": {
      ...
    },
    ...
  }
}
```
